s.text: "There are now just over 1 million poor citizens in Ohio who qualify for our services.
"There are now just over 1 million poor citizens in Ohio who qualify for our services.
A decrease in the number of poor people in Ohio means there will be $2 million less in federal legal-aid money for the state next year, officials said yesterday.

People will be able to download court forms and other documents specific to the county in which they live from the Web site, said Pryce, a Republican from Upper Arlington.
